value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to set up staging environments in Azure App Service by using deployment slots. value.title: Implement serverless APIs with Azure Functions and Azure API Management | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly deploy and manage your Serverless API's using OpenAPI and API Management.  0:00 – Overview 0:40 – OpenAPI definition (fka Swagger) 2:15 – Using API Management to build an OpenAPI definition 3:48 – Reviewing the generated OpenAPI definition

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Build Serverless APIs with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio Code to build a JavaScript and Vue.js dashboard with a Serverless API powered by Azure Functions, Node.js and Cosmos DB.

value.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure VM disk performance and how to enable caching to help optimize read and write access to storage.

value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of webhooks when you trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

value.excerpt: After a machine learning model has been deployed into production, it's important to understand how it is being used by capturing and viewing telemetry.

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure cloud platform through the Azure portal, where you create and manage all of your Azure resources.

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: How to add the Azure Cloud Shell to Visual Studio Code | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to add the Azure Cloud Shell to Visual Studio Code. value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data. value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link.
